    1: from pandas import Timestamp
    2: 
    3: 
    4: class TestTimestampToJulianDate:
    5:     def test_compare_1700(self):
    6:         ts = Timestamp("1700-06-23")
    7:         res = ts.to_julian_date()
    8:         assert res == 2_342_145.5
    9: 
   10:     def test_compare_2000(self):
   11:         ts = Timestamp("2000-04-12")
   12:         res = ts.to_julian_date()
   13:         assert res == 2_451_646.5
   14: 
   15:     def test_compare_2100(self):
   16:         ts = Timestamp("2100-08-12")
   17:         res = ts.to_julian_date()
   18:         assert res == 2_488_292.5
   19: 
   20:     def test_compare_hour01(self):
   21:         ts = Timestamp("2000-08-12T01:00:00")
   22:         res = ts.to_julian_date()
   23:         assert res == 2_451_768.5416666666666666
   24: 
   25:     def test_compare_hour13(self):
   26:         ts = Timestamp("2000-08-12T13:00:00")
   27:         res = ts.to_julian_date()
   28:         assert res == 2_451_769.0416666666666666
